lead_paragraph: Sue Bird led all scorers with 20 points and Candace Parker had 12 points and 10 rebounds yesterday to lead the two-time defending champion United States to a 119-72 victory over China on the first day of the Women’s World Basketball Championship in São Paulo, Brazil.
